title: Get Help from Auntie Ethel
content:
ou defeat Auntie Ethel, use the control orb (X:-422 Y:565) to bring down Mayrina and free her. Once you do so, Mayrina will show that she is upset with what you did. This will give you the following dialogue options.

Slow down - What did I do? I'm sorry. I was trying to help. this is an interesting way of thanking me. I don't need this. Good luck getting out of here on your own.

Choosing dialogue 1 will have Mayrina explain that Auntie Ethel was going to bring her husband back from the dead. T
